snippet.title: Octopath Traveler - Paths of Purchase and Potions Info Trailer - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Eight travelers. Eight adventures. Eight roles to play in a new world brought to life by Square Enix. Step into the shoes and stories of two more travelers, Tressa the Merchant and Alfyn the Apothecary. Then, discover details on jobs in battle. Octopath Traveler on Nintendo Switch releases July 13, 2018!

Learn more about Octopath Traveler! https://goo.gl/4x3vc4

#NintendoSwitch #OctopathTraveler

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com
